metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12816 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Modules.cpp in ZNC before 1.7.4-rc1 allows remote authenticated non-adminusers to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code by loading a modulewith a crafted name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

znc - 1.6.6-1ubuntu0.2
znc-perl - 1.6.6-1ubuntu0.2
znc-python - 1.6.6-1ubuntu0.2
znc-tcl - 1.6.6-1ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: znc package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.6-1ubuntu0.2').
